hsbc-main.select_account_type: Choose the type of account you want to open
hsbc-main.have_phone: Before you start, take your mobile phone to e-sign your contract by entering a code received by SMS
hsbc-main.sms_check: I intend to be contacted by e-mail or SMS
hsbc-main.notice_consommateur: Every consumer has the possibility of registering for free on the opposition list to solicit telephone: www.bloctel.gouv.fr It is forbidden for a professional to telephone a consumer registered on this list, Except in the case of contractual relations.
hsbc-main.code_postal_ville_naissance: Postal code of the town of birth
hsbc-main.status_us_person: Do you have the status of «US Person» ?
hsbc-main.main_residence_status: For your main residence, you are:
hsbc-main.pourquoi_demandons_ces_informations: Why do we ask for this information ?
hsbc-main.notice_ouverture_compte: For any account opening, the regulation requires banks to justify a perfect customer knowledge and the operations that they carry out. This information will be used exclusively within the framework of our banking relationship and will allow us to offer you the best quality of service.
hsbc-main.adresse_courrier_different: Is your postal address different from your home address ?
hsbc-main.adresse_courrier_different_second: postal address different from his/her home address ?
hsbc-main.pourquoi_ouvrir_compte_hsbc_france: Why do you want to open an HSBC account in France ?
hsbc-main.modal_minor_title: We invite you to book an appointment agency there
hsbc-main.modal_minor_content: You must be major to be able to subscribe on-line. We invite you to book an appointment agency there accompanied with your legal representative.
hsbc-main.error_field_only_letters_spaces_num: Only letters, numbers and spaces allowed
hsbc-main.error_field_other_nationnality: You can't have twice this nationality
hsbc-main.error_field_other_country: You can't select this country twice.
hsbc-main.error_field_least_one: Please choose at least one option
hsbc-main.error_field_days_12_60: The number of days must be between 12 and 60.
hsbc-main.error_field_days_30_90: The number of days must be between 30 and 90.
hsbc-main.error_field_IBAN: Votre IBAN doit commner par FR et contenir 25 chiffres
hsbc-main.error_field_patrimony_country: Select one or more country / countries
hsbc-main.tooltip_us_person: En général, personne de nationalité américaine, résident américain ou détenteur d'une « green card ». Si vous êtes US Person ou si vous présentez certains liens avec les Etats Unis, des formulaires complémentaires obligatoires sont à nous fournir et vous seront précisés lors de l'étude de votre dossier.
hsbc-main.tooltip_situation_pro: Qu'est-ce qu'un contrôleur principal ? Le rôle de contrôleur principal dans une entreprise se rapproche d'un actionnaire de référence, d'un administrateur ou encore d'un mandataire.
hsbc-main.tooltip_bic: Bénéfices non-commerciaux et bénéfices industriels et commerciaux.
hsbc-main.tooltip_fiscal_country: Chaque pays possède ses propres règles pour définir la résidence fiscale. En général, le pays de votre résidence fiscale est le pays dans lequel vous vivez. Des circonstances particulières (études, activité professionnelle ou voyage de longue durée) peuvent faire de vous un résident fiscal d'un ou plusieurs autre pays. Le pays dans lequel vous payez des impôts n’est pas nécessairement votre pays de résidence fiscale. Il vous appartient de déterminer sous votre propre responsabilité votre/vos pays de résidence fiscale. Pour plus d'informations, veuillez consulter votre conseil fiscal indépendant ou le portail internet de l'OCDE relatif à l'échange automatique d'informations.
hsbc-main.tax_num_country_add: Add another country of fiscal residence
hsbc-main.tax_num_no_have: I don't have fiscal informations number
hsbc-main.tax_num_where_AT: As a tax resident of Austria Your Tax Identification Number is on the first page of your income tax return.
hsbc-main.tax_num_where_BE:
As a tax resident of Belgium your National Number (NN) can be find on: 
- Your Identity Card 
- Your Social Security Card
hsbc-main.tax_num_where_CA: As a tax resident of Canada your Social Insurance Numbere (NAS) can be find on the first sheet of your tax return.
hsbc-main.tax_num_where_US: As a tax resident of United States your Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) can be find on your income tax return.
hsbc-main.tax_num_where_HK: En tant que résident fiscal de Hong-Kong votre HKID number se trouve sur votre carte d'identité.
hsbc-main.tax_num_where_GB:
As a tax resident of United Kingdom your Unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR) or your National Insurance Number (NINO) can be find on: 
- Your tax return 
- Account statement 
- Your Social Security Card 
- Letter by the Department of Labor and Pensions (DWP) 
- Payroll Sheet
hsbc-main.tax_num_where_SG: As a tax resident of Singapore your NRIC or FIN can be find on your Identity Card.
hsbc-main.tax_num_where_CH: As a tax resident of Switzerland your OASI Number can be find on your Insurance Certificate.
hsbc-main.tax_num_reason_1: Your country of tax residence does not allocate tax identification numbers to its residents.
hsbc-main.tax_num_reason_2: A tax identification number is not required (note: to be selected only if the authorities of the country of tax residence above do not enforce its disclosure).
hsbc-main.tax_num_reason_3: You cannot obtain a tax identification number for another reason (if you select this reason, please explain in the space provided below why you are unable to obtain a tax identification number).
hsbc-main.patrimony_question: Why do we ask for this information ?
hsbc-main.patrimony_desc: Every consumer has the possibility of registering for free on the opposition list to solicit telephone: www.bloctel.gouv.fr It is forbidden for a professional to telephone a consumer registered on this list, Except in the case of contractual relations.
hsbc-main.patrimony_country_question: From which country(ies) are your assets principally sourced?
hsbc-main.patrimony_immo_others: Other property and real estate investments
hsbc-main.holder_same_address: Does the co-holder also live at this address?
hsbc-main.monthly_income_question: Why do we ask for this information ?
hsbc-main.monthly_income_caption: Every consumer has the possibility of registering for free on the opposition list to solicit telephone: www.bloctel.gouv.fr It is forbidden for a professional to telephone a consumer registered on this list, Except in the case of contractual relations.
hsbc-main.monthly_income_add: Add an other source of income
hsbc-main.error_same_email: The email must be different of co-holder email
hsbc-main.error_same_phone: Phone number must be different of co-holder phone number
hsbc-main.your_account_question: Do you wish to benefit from a full range of banking services ?
hsbc-main.your_account_hexagon: With HSBC Hexagone, all the essential banking services are available to you at the lowest cost: bank cards, current account transactions, personal belongings insurance, overdraft facility.
hsbc-main.your_account_hexagon_mono: I wish to benefit from the cash facility of the Hexagon convention (1)
hsbc-main.your_account_hexagon_joint: We wish to benefit from the cash facility of the Hexagon convention (1)
hsbc-main.your_account_av3: - Unlimited cash withdrawals at all ATMs in France and the eurozone
hsbc-main.your_account_av4: - No cheque book and card issue costs (excl. postage)
hsbc-main.your_account_av6: - No card and PIN number reissue fees
hsbc-main.your_account_av7: - Free overdraft charges up to €12 per quarter
hsbc-main.your_account_facility_desc: Of up to €3,000 per month - can be used for a maximum of 15 days (consecutive or not) per 30-day period
hsbc-main.your_account_alert_desc: 25 alerts per month (via SMS or email)
hsbc-main.your_account_student_desc: -50% on their monthly membership fee with the Visa Classic card until your 28th birthday or the loss of student status.
hsbc-main.your_account_card: Select the bank card that suits you best integrate
hsbc-main.your_account_card_premier: With Premier Visa or Gold MasterCard
hsbc-main.your_account_cond1: Subject to acceptance of your application. See applicable contract terms and conditions at www.hsbc.fr.
hsbc-main.your_account_offer: Help us to provide an international service that best suits your needs
hsbc-main.your_account_offer_question: Why do we ask for this information ?
hsbc-main.your_account_offer_desc: Every consumer has the possibility of registering for free on the opposition list to solicit telephone: www.bloctel.gouv.fr It is forbidden for a professional to telephone a consumer registered on this list, Except in the case of contractual relations.
hsbc-main.your_account_emit_question: Are you intending to make or receive regular international transfers over the next 12 months ?
hsbc-main.your_account_emit_number_question: How many transfers do you intend to make each month?
hsbc-main.your_account_receive_question: Are you intending to make or receive regular international transfers over the next 12 months ?
hsbc-main.your_account_receive_number_question: How many transfers do you intend to make each month?
hsbc-main.your_account_emit_value_question: What is the likely monthly amount of these transfers ?
hsbc-main.your_account_no_transac: I do not intend to perform any international transactions
hsbc-main.follow_account_direct_agency_desc_1: You wish to select the HSBC online branch to perform all your transactions remotely.
hsbc-main.follow_account_direct_agency_desc_2: Our advisors work extended business hours to fit in with your schedule - contact them via secure messaging or telephone between 8am and 10pm Monday to Friday and 9am to 5pm on Saturday.
hsbc-main.follow_account_remote_agency_desc_1: You wish to select the HSBC branch closest to your home or place of work.
hsbc-main.follow_account_remote_agency_desc_2: You will be able to consult an advisor at the branch.
hsbc-main.card_type_caption: You wish to subscribe to an international credit card with a maximum guarantee?
hsbc-main.vc_desc_a1: Make payments in France and abroad
hsbc-main.vc_desc_a2: Free withdrawals from all HSBC ATMs worldwide
hsbc-main.vc_desc_a3: Insurance and assistance included when you are travelling once your application has been approved
hsbc-main.vc_desc_a4: Subject to acceptance of your application. See applicable contract terms and conditions at www.hsbc.fr.
hsbc-main.vc_desc_a6: See terms and conditions in your local branch.
hsbc-main.vc_desc_a7: Make payments in France and abroad
hsbc-main.vp_desc_a2: Vos retraits gratuits à l’étranger dans tous les distributeurs HSBC à travers le monde
hsbc-main.vp_desc_a3: Free withdrawals abroad from all HSBC ATMs worldwide
hsbc-main.vp_desc_a4: Extended insurance and assistance package for peace of mind when travelling
hsbc-main.vp_desc_a5: 30-day purchase protection insurance in the event of accidental damage
hsbc-main.gm_desc_a1: Special discounts and benefits from Visa Premier partners
hsbc-main.card_type_no: I do not wish to apply for a credit card.
hsbc-main.card_utilisation_desc: Would you like HSBC to help you change bank ?
hsbc-main.card_utilisation_domiciliation: Direct your transfers and direct debits
hsbc-main.card_utilisation_easy: The HSBC Easy service: it's simple, free and efficient to switch your transfers and direct debits (1) to your HSBC France accounts.
hsbc-main.card_utilisation_offer_5: domiciliating 3 transfers and / or withdrawals from your HSBC account (3). These vouchers are valid in more than 100 e-merchant partners
hsbc-main.card_utilisation_offer_desc_1: At the moment and until April 30, 2017, also benefit from €50
hsbc-main.card_utilisation_offer_desc_2: paid into your account for 5 additional transactions domiciled on your account
hsbc-main.card_utilisation_offer_desc_3: Changing bank has never been so easy:
hsbc-main.card_utilisation_offer_desc_4: Employer, housing, URSSAF, taxes, insurance, energy provider, Internet access or telephone ... are all public or private organizations to be notified when you change banks or want to consolidate all your transfers and withdrawals from your HSBC account.
hsbc-main.card_utilisation_offer_desc_5: Free: get a 100% free service regardless of the number of organizations to be informed.
hsbc-main.card_utilisation_offer_desc_6: Simple: give HSBC France (1) a mandate in just a few clicks to manage on your behalf the switch your transfers and direct debits.
hsbc-main.card_utilisation_offer_desc_7: Effective: you are informed in real time, in your secure private banking space or by email, of the steps taken and their progress(6).
hsbc-main.card_utilisation_iban_label: Please specify the IBAN of your current starting account
hsbc-main.card_utilisation_origin_label: Do you have permanent transfer orders in the original account ?
hsbc-main.card_utilisation_cloture_label: Do you want HSBC to close your old bank account for you and transfer the credit balance to your new HSBC account ?
hsbc-main.card_utilisation_cloture_label_2: After how many days do you want the permanent transfer orders on the original account to be canceled ?
hsbc-main.card_utilisation_cloture_delay: After how many days would you like your old account to be automatically closed and the credit balance transferred ?
hsbc-main.card_utilisation_question: How do you wish to use your account?
hsbc-main.card_utilisation_question_amount: What monthly amount are you likely to place with us over the next 12 months?
hsbc-main.card_utilisation_question_contact: How would you like to be contacted if there is a risk of a cheque rejection due to lack of funds?
hsbc-main.card_utilisation_question_account_choice: Which account would you like to domiciliating from HSBC ?
hsbc-main.recap_modify_caption: Please check all your information before signing your contract.
hsbc-main.recap_iban: If yes - IBAN of the existing account
hsbc-main.recap_account_utilisation_amount: If no – Monthly amount to be place with us
